long_description: A sleek bike you'll love to ride, the Scott Contessa Speedster 45 women's bike invites you onto the road with an light aero aluminum frame, smooth carbon fork and 24 gears for any terrain. Double-butted 6061 aluminum frame boasts aerodynamic tube shaping for sleek, responsive performance. Carbon fork with alloy steer tube reduces weight and dampens energy-draining road vibrations. Shimano triple crankset is paired with an 11-28 cassette for gear combinations to handle every ride, from long climbs to fast descents and everything between. Shimano derailleurs and shifters deliver dependable, responsive shifting through the 24 gears. Alex Race 28 Aero Profile rims are wrapped with Schwalbe Lugano tires to provide smooth-rolling performance. Please note: pedals are sold separately. Specs on the Scott Contessa Speedster 45 women's bike are subject to change.
short_description: A sleek bike you'll love to ride, the Scott Contessa Speedster 45 women's bike invites you onto the road with an light aero aluminum frame, smooth carbon fork and 24 gears for any terrain.
